name: Hidden Kingdom
description:
The download link will take you to a DROPBOX file. 

Itch.io caps the file size at 750 MB. This game is over that size, so you have to download it off of dropbox.

Download Instructions

1. Download the file off of dropbox.

2. Use 7Zip or Winrar or any similar application to extract the file.

3. A file named Project1 will appear.

4. Click on Project1 file

5. Click on game.exe. 

6. Have fun

Current Version - 0.0.5.4.1

Next update will be: During The Summer

Read the dev logs for update information.

Known Bugs:

- A Main Storyline

- Several Side Storylines

- Crafting system

- Class / Skill system

- Large variety of classes to chose from

- A large and entertaining world

- Tons of zones to explore

- Tons of items, weapons, armour, and spells
